testcase.name: Login Mobile Store with Valid username and Password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Mobile Store first screen for Login Test Case Execution.......passed Then Change Application language as English.................................passed Then Click on Login Button..................................................passed Then Enter valid username "andri+trial-1@xendit.co" and valid Password "Xendit.co!1".passed Then Create a PIN and Confirm PIN again.....................................passed And I should be on Home screen..............................................passed Then I should be able to logout.............................................passed
